title: how to take screenshots in python?
creator: mazen ramadan
description: learn how to take python screenshots through selenium and playwright, including common browser tips and tricks for customizing web page captures.

title: what is the best screenshot api in 2024?
creator: mazen ramadan

title: web scraping with go
creator: mazen ramadan
description: learn web scraping with golang, from native http requests and html parsing to a step-by-step guide to using colly, the go web crawling package.

title: how to power-up llms with web scraping and rag
creator: mazen ramadan
description: in depth look at how to use llm and web scraping for rag applications using either llamaindex or langchain.

title: web scraping with cloud browsers
creator: mazen ramadan
description: introduction cloud browsers and their benefits and a step-by-step setup with self-hosted selenium-grid cloud browsers.

title: how to scrape forms
creator: mazen ramadan
description: learn how to scrape forms through a step-by-step guide using http clients and headless browsers.

title: how to scrape reddit posts, subreddits and profiles
creator: mazen ramadan
description: in this article, we'll explore how to scrape reddit. we'll extract various social data types from subreddits, posts, and user pages. all of which through plain http requests without headless browser usage.

title: how to scrape with headless firefox
creator: mazen ramadan
description: discover how to use headless firefox with selenium, playwright, and puppeteer for web scraping, including practical examples for each library.

title: how to use tor for web scraping
creator: mazen ramadan
description: in this article, we'll explain web scraping using tor. for this, we'll use tor as a proxy server to change the ip address randomly in either http or socks, as well as using it as a rotating proxy server.

creator: mazen ramadan
description: in this article we'll take a look at two popular tools: whatwaf and wafw00f which can identify what waf service is used.

title: how to scrape linkedin in 2024
creator: mazen ramadan
description: in this scrape guide we'll be taking a look at one of the most popular web scraping targets - linkedin.com. we'll be scraping people profiles, company profiles as well as job listings and search.

title: selenium wire tutorial: intercept background requests
creator: mazen ramadan
description: in this guide, we'll explore web scraping with selenium wire. we'll define what it is, how to install it, and how to use it to inspect and manipulate background requests.

title: how to scrape similarweb website traffic analytics
creator: mazen ramadan
description: in this guide, we'll explain how to scrape similarweb through a step-by-step guide. we'll scrape comprehensive website traffic insights, websites comparing data, sitemaps, and trending industry domains.

title: how to scrape bestbuy product, offer and review data
creator: mazen ramadan
description: learn how to scrape bestbuy, one of the most popular retail stores for electronic stores in the united states. we'll scrape different data types from product, search, review, and sitemap pages using different web scraping techniques.
